title: Bugsplatting is ruining the fun.
body:
So recently the new client was bugging out and 3 matches in a row bugsplatting. It wont let me connect to the game and gives the error repair that takes 15 - 20 mins.

Now i also got a leaverbuster for 5 matches each 20 mins.

Riot plz, fix this. Its no fun if i cant play the game and getting a punishment 20 mins of queue and wouldnt join the game anyway.



Plz {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
Let's see if we can get to the bottom of those bug splats so you don't have to deal with that low priority queue anymore. Bug Splats can be caused by a number of different things like drivers or corrupted game files. Let's cover all our bases by going through all the steps in this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974).


While we troubleshoot, be sure to test changes in custom games to avoid any more penalties!
